meanings.definition: The state or quality of being unclean.
meanings.sent1: The uncleannesses of the kitchen made me want to clean it immediately.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand the uncleannesses of the public restroom.
meanings.sent3: The uncleannesses of the muddy puddle made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: The uncleannesses of his mind were like a fog obscuring his thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The uncleannesses of the old attic were revealed when they opened the door.

meanings.definition: Actions or behaviors that are impure or dirty.
meanings.sent1: The uncleannesses of his lies were finally exposed.
meanings.sent2: She avoided the uncleannesses of gossip in the office.
meanings.sent3: The uncleannesses of the prank were hilarious in hindsight.
meanings.sent4: The uncleannesses of corruption spread like a stain in the organization.
meanings.sent5: The uncleannesses of the crime scene left a lasting impression on the detective.
